pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 15, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 15, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard, the Mayor of Montréal and President of the Montréal Metropolitan Community, Denis Coderre, and the President and CEO of the Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec, Michael Sabia. A media availability will follow.

945 de la Gauchetière
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m. and present themselves to room 3

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a food-kit building event hosted by the humanitarian organization Islamic Relief Canada.

Wichita Palace
8386 Saint-Laurent Boulevard
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
